abilities.desc: Tusk compresses shards of ice into a ball of frozen energy that damages all enemies it comes in contact with. When the ball reaches its target destination the shards are released, creating a barrier that lasts for [4, 5, 6, 7] seconds.
abilities.name: Ice Shards

abilities.desc: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a 350 radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage.
abilities.name: Snowball
abilities.notes: Allies can click on a snowball to add themselves to it.

abilities.desc: Temporarily applies a negative debuff aura around you, causing enemies that are attacked under it to take bonus physical damage and reduced movement speed. Lasts 5.0 seconds.
abilities.name: Tag Team
abilities.notes: Affects attacks from allied heroes, Tusk or any of his units.

abilities.desc: Kicks the closest enemy unit in a targeted direction, stunning, damaging, and slowing them. Also deals damage to all heroes within 250 radius of its landing area. Cooldown is reduced by 50% if kicking a creep.
abilities.name: Walrus Kick

abilities.desc: Summons a flying Sigil that slows movement speed by -40% for enemies within 650 radius. Lasts 25 seconds. Cooldown: 30
abilities.name: Frozen Sigil
abilities.notes: Heroes deal 1 damage to the sigil, while non-hero units deal 0.25 damage.

abilities.desc: Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike so powerful it launches its victim into the air. The victim is slowed upon landing.
abilities.name: Walrus PUNCH!

abilities.desc: Launch the snowball toward the target.
abilities.name: Launch Snowball
abilities.notes: Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage.
